name: Atlantico
goal: Atlantico is a public affairs and communications consulting agency for exporters and investors with a focus on the European Union and Latin America axis.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Atlantico provides regulatory support in trade and fiscal policy, competition and distribution, agriculture and consumer goods.
